content.html: Years ago I was offered a sabbatical. I refused, because I wanted to stay on top of the things I had going at work at the time. You know what’s funny? I have no recollection of what those specific things were. But I am sure I would remember what I would have done w the time off.
content.value:
Years ago I was offered a sabbatical. I refused, because I wanted to stay on top of the things I had going at work at the time. 
You know what’s funny? I have no recollection of what those specific things were. But I am sure I would remember what I would have done w the time off.

content.html: Shout it from the mountaintops! If you ever get the oppty to take time off from your workaday life, esp for weeks/months, do it! You'll remember it for the rest of your life, and you'll come back to work re-invigorated. This is a great post about it: joelonsoftware.com/2000/03/18/mor…
content.value:
Shout it from the mountaintops!

If you ever get the oppty to take time off from your workaday life, esp for weeks/months, do it!

You'll remember it for the rest of your life, and you'll come back to work re-invigorated.

This is a great post about it: joelonsoftware.com/2000/03/18/mor…
